intro: Sondera porrecta, commonly known as the narrowleaf sondera, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its slender, erect stems and lance-shaped leaves. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
